shrimp.name: fBm2D
shrimp.author: rconstruct

input.name: x
input.description: x coordinate to sample fBm at

input.name: y
input.description: y coordinate to sample fBm at

input.name: lacunarity
input.description: Controls the smoothness of the fBm

input.name: gain
input.description: Controls the contrast of the fBm

shrimp.usage: fBm is a sumation of noises at different frequencies. Note that the output is not clamped and may exceed +1 or -1.
